name: Laser Revolver, Disposable, Obsolete (ObDLRe-16)
description: Obsolete version of the laser revolver. This weapon fires a coherent beam of photons and is powered by an on-board cell. This version is constructed of relatively inexpensive materials and has a working lifetime measured in days.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
